arts.ttl: Brentford vs Newcastle: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 11, 2025
arts.sum: The 24 year old, who signed for the Bees from Club Brugge in 2024 before suffering an ACL injury which ruled him out for most of the season, has wasted no time impressing the new manager, notching six Premier League goals from his opening 10 matches. Meanwhile, Newcastle travel down to London having endured a mixed start to their season, with their 13th place standing a far cry from their European football ambitions.
